title: Vaishnavi Polki Haaram with Emerald Drops
features: A stunning Polki Haaram featuring large, meticulously set uncut diamonds in a closed setting. Each Polki diamond is surrounded by smaller pave-set diamonds, creating a halo effect. The bottom of the necklace is adorned with vibrant green Emerald drops, adding a touch of regal elegance. The back chain is elegantly crafted for comfortable wear. Design inspired by Nizam era jewelry.
occasions: milestone events (like Seemantham or half-saree function)
or any occasion where you want to make a statement.
description: This Polki Haaram is a timeless investment, showcasing exceptional craftsmanship and the unparalleled beauty of uncut diamonds. The piece is hand-crafted by skilled artisans, embodying the rich heritage of Hyderabadi jewelry making. The combination of Polki diamonds and Emeralds symbolizes prosperity and good fortune, making it a perfect heirloom piece. Its unique design blends traditional aesthetics with a contemporary flair, ensuring it complements both traditional and modern attire. Hyderabadi polish ensures a long-lasting luster and a rich, luxurious look.
